DOC.brief_title: Promoting Sport Participation During Early Parenthood
DOC.detailed_description: This study explore impact team sport psychological well-being parent compare individual sport `` night '' . Our research question include : Does 1 ) team sport participation ( choice-based exist adult recreation league great Victoria ) increase psychosocial outcome ( quality life , relationship satisfaction , social functioning , perceive parenting capability , enjoyment ) compare 2 ) individual sport participation ( choice-based adult recreation alternative great Victoria ) , 3 ) standard control condition ? Hypothesis : The team sport condition show significantly large change psychosocial outcome compare two condition three-months participation ( primary end-point ) . Furthermore , individual sport condition show significantly large change psychosocial outcome compare control condition three-months participation . Secondary Research Questions 1 . Can participation team sport individual sport condition explain construct Sport Commitment model [ 21 ] ? Hypothesis : Participation predict sport commitment per tenet Sport Commitment Model , commitment predict primarily enjoyment ( + ) , social constraint family obligations/involvement alternative ( - ) , follow social involvement opportunities/personal investment ( + ) . 2 . Can group difference among parent regard participation psychosocial outcome explain mediation model ? Hypothesis : The covariance assign condition psychosocial outcome explain sport participation . In turn , covariance participation assign condition explain salient underlie motif Sport Commitment Model . In particular , enjoyment explain difference sport condition well psychosocial outcome team sport explain additional social involvement opportunity . 3 . Is seasonal , gender , dual/single parent , age child , type sport difference across primary outcome assign condition ? Hypothesis : These exploratory research question pre-set hypothesis . Both sport condition may participation lower weather condition winter . Men may participate sport due low child-rearing expectation limit research support conjecture time .
